name: NCU Memories
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Legacy of Xan NCU memories come in 4 different sorts and can be upgraded 6 times. #L "Base NCU - Type 00 (0/6)" "277436" #L "NCU Memory Cell" "277182" x 6 or #L "Intelligence Memory Cell" "277170" x 6 or #L "Biological Metamorphosis Memory Cell" "277831" x 6 or #L "1-Hand Blunt Memory Cell" "277904" x 6 ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ NCU Memory NCU Note:NCU Memory exclusively buffs your NCU. At QL300 it will buff a massive 192 NCU with 6 Memory Cells added to it. Base NCU - Type 00 (0/6) + NCU Memory Cell = #L "Memory NCU (1/6)" "278757" Skills: | Requires QLx1.5 EE QLx1.5 NP QLx4.5 CL| Repeat 5 times for: #L "Memory NCU (6/6)" "278782" Abilities NCU Note:Abilities NCU can buff all your base abilities by up to 5 per NCU. It can include one cell of each ability Base NCU - Type 00 (0/6) + Intelligence Memory Cell = #L "Abilities NCU - Type 02 (1/6)" "277051" Skills: | Requires QLx1.5 EE QLx1.5 NP QLx4.5 CL| Repeat 5 times for: #L "Abilities NCU - Type 3F (6/6)" "277166" Nano NCU Note:Nano NCUs can buff all six nano skills at the same time by up to 5 per NCU. It can only include one cell of each ability Base NCU - Type 00 (0/6) + Biological Metamorphosis Memory Cell = #L "Nano NCU - Type 01 (1/6)" "277506" Skills: | Requires QLx1.5 EE QLx1.5 NP QLx4.5 CL| Repeat 5 times for: #L "Nano NCU - Type 3F (6/6)" "277823" Weapons NCU Note:Abilities NCU can buff all your base abilities by up to 5 per NCU. It can include one cell of each ability Base NCU - Type 00 (0/6) + 1-Hand Blunt Memory Cell = #L "1-Hand Blunt Skill NCU (1/6)" "278314" Skills: | Requires QLx1.5 EE QLx1.5 NP QLx4.5 CL| Repeat 5 times for: #L "1-Hand Blunt Skill NCU (6/6)" "278339"
